replies.msg: Wenger: "Stoke played well and we didn't play well in the first half. We lacked urgency, pace, drive and in the second half we rectified that."

Aaron Ramsey: "It was a difficult first half. Sometimes that happens after the international break but it was important to us to stay in the game. We're delighted to get the three points. We were committed and it was important not to concede."

Wenger on Aubameyang giving Lacazette penalty: That shows the state of our society. When people are generous we're surprised.

replies.msg: Still baffled at how we went from Giroud & Welbeck as our first choice strikers to Aubameyang & Lacazette within a few months. We've finally replaced Van Persie. It's taken us a good 6 years to do so, but this summer we seriously need to build a perfect system around these two.

è—æ–¯ç®—ä¿‚å’å•¦,ä»Šå­£éƒ½ç®—ç©©å®š

Still baffled at how we went from Giroud & Welbeck as our first choice strikers to Aubameyang & Lacazette within a few months. We've finally replaced Van Persie. It's taken us a good 6 years to do so, but this summer we seriously need to build a perfect system around these two.
